sentence: RELATED: Georgia GOP outraged Trump turned against Brian Kemp: 'I am just so mad beyond words" Back in March, the president held a tele-rally in support of Perdue, lining the candidate's campaign coffer with half a million dollars.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Mike Pence and top Republicans flock to Georgia to defeat Trump's candidate in key primary

sentence: I am with David all the way because Brian Kemp was the WORST Governor in the Country on Election Integrity,? he added.
author: Caroline Vakil
title: Trump calls NBC story on him giving up on Perdue a phony narrative

author: Caroline Vakil
title: Walker declines to say if he backed Perdue or Kemp in Ga. gubernatorial primary

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Kemp's landslide victory in Georgia's GOP gubernatorial primary a stinging setback for Trump
